name: HENTAI Sliding Puzzle
description:
HENTAI Sliding Puzzle is a classic puzzle game. These puzzles will surely prove a tricky test for your brain. The beauty and elegance of the puzzles will surely make you fall in love with them. So just lean back, relax, and refresh your mind with this huge collection of puzzles. This slide puzzle game will improve your thinking skills, speed and hand-eye coordination.

You have to slide the tiles to reassemble a picture, by clicking the block you want to move.

HENTAI Sliding Puzzle includes a total of 58 pictures.
You can choose the size of the board between 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x5 and 6x6 blocks for more challenge!

Sliding Puzzle features:
- A total of 58 pictures
- Choose a board size of 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x5 and 6x6 blocks
- High quality and cute images
